mapper.select: select bo.no, bo.title, bo.content, bo.hit, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') reg_date, bo.user_no, us.name from board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no order by reg_date desc
select bo.no, bo.title, bo.content, bo.hit, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') reg_date, bo.user_no, us.name from board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no and bo.no = #{no}
insert into board values(seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, default, sysdate, #{no})
